title: Developing a Strong Partnership
itunes:author: Guest: Kevin Thompson
itunes:summary:
Your marriage needs a strong partnership to function well. Encouraging each other can go a long way to strengthening your relationship. John speaks with Greg and Erin about how they've learned to encourage each other's strengths. Featuring Pastor Kevin Thompson.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Receive the book "Friends, Partners and Lover" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2022-06-30?refcd=1457004

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/developing-a-strong-partnership/#featured-resource-cta

Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/embracing-your-role-as-a-spouse-digital/?refcd=1457004

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
